system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Each time a snared character fails a Strength/Agility Test to escape Snare, imposes -10 Penalty on future tests. If exceeds -30, the victim is hopelessly trapped and cannot escape. Webbing breaks down on its own after 1d5 hours.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Blast (5), Snare

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Each time a snared character fails a Strength/Agility Test to escape Snare, imposes -10 Penalty on future tests. If exceeds -30, the victim is hopelessly trapped and cannot escape. Webbing breaks down on its own after 1d5 hours.
